dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.ServiceSpecCharValueUse
dataStructure.description:
This association defines the allowed set of values (represented as instances of theServiceSpecCharacteristicValue object) that a specific ServiceSpecification can have when that ServiceSpecification object is instantiated.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceSpecCharValueUse

child.name: _default
child.description:
Indicates if the value is the default value for a characterisitc.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: _default

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time for which a value is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
